This is a basic forest succession module based on Canada Land Cover Classes 2005 and Beacons. It takes a vegetation map, with the BEACONS 11 classifications (7 of which are primarily used for forests) and make a simple forest succession.

## Plotting

The module produces 2 plots:   
  1 - Vegetation map after succession;  
  2 - Trajectory map of succession.  

## Saving

There is no default saving.
